title: Admin Page Has Changes Success Response
description: Schema for the successful response of checking if a page has unpublished changes for an admin.

page_id.description: The ID of the page being checked.

has_unpublished_changes.description: Whether the current draft has unpublished changes compared to the published version.

current_published_version_id.description: The ID of the currently published version, null if no version is published.

current_published_version_number.description: The version number of the currently published version, null if no version is published.
